text: A local holiday has been declared for Pudukottai district on April 11 in view of the annual car festival of the Arulmigu Muthumariamman Temple at Narathamalai. All government offices and educational institutions would remain closed. However, the District Treasury and Sub Treasuries would function with limited staff. April 23 would be a working day in lieu of the local holiday, Collector S.Ganesh said in a press release.
title: Local holiday on April 11
